title: Riverfront Location on the Swanky East Side
posting_body: Check out this 78741 modern apartment located off one of the most up and coming areas of Austin, East Riverside.
Where your backyard is Lady Bird Lake and you're seconds from a beautiful walk down the boardwalk!
Hosting private balconies, stainless appliances, subway tile backsplash and custom cabinetry your bound to love coming home to your stylish apartment every night.
If you are one of Austin's aspiring or established musicians, take advantage of the soundproof jam studio!
Living less than 5 minutes from downtown and less than 15 minutes from the airport is just another one of the many reasons this is a perfect place to land in town.
From the practical to the exquisite, this prime Austin location covers all your essentials.
Call/Text Trent to check it out today.

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
